title: Juventus set Mario Mandzukic asking price ahead of Man Utd transfer

Manchester United have been informed by Juventus of Mario Mandzukic’s asking price.

Mandzukic was targeted by the Red Devils in the final days of the summer transfer window as a replacement for Romelu Lukaku, who left for Inter Milan.

A deal failed to materialise but the 33-year-old striker remains on Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s radar ahead of January’s mid-season sales.

According to Calciomercato , United are in negotiations with Juventus to discuss a potential transfer, while Sevilla are also interested.

And Juventus have reportedly informed both clubs they are willing to sell for €5.3m (£4.6m).

Solskjaer has confirmed the club will prioritise the signing of a striker in January having recently admitted he is short of options in attack.

(Image: SIMONE ARVEDA/EPA-EFE/REX)

Despite only having Marcus Rashford, Anthony Martial and 18-year-old Mason Greenwood at his disposal, the United boss defended his failure to bring in another attacker over the summer.

Solskjaer said: “I can say [I am a striker short], but that was the decision that I made and I made it happily.

“When you have players, [they may have] great potential, but Romelu’s head was not here for us working forward as a group.

“I don’t want to speak too much about other players. I have got lots of respects for Romelu but his time was up here.

(Image: Juventus FC via Getty Images)

“We are very happy with the recruitment we did. Towards the end the right one we just didn’t get him over the line.

“You’d rather bite the bullet and wait because you don’t want to spend big amounts of money on something that you are not sure of.”

Despite a poor start to the season, United are expected to back Solskjaer in the upcoming transfer window.

(Image: REUTERS)

Mandzukic is likely to be short of match fitness, however, if he moves to Old Trafford.

The Croatian has been frozen out of the first-team picture by Maurizio Sarri, failing to make an appearance for Juventus this term.

He was also scrubbed from the Old Lady’s Champions League squad for the group stage of the competition.
description: Manchester United are on the hunt for a new striker in the January transfer window after failing to replace Romelu Lukaku
